reviewText: Accurate description and shipped on time

If you like actual Cop documentaries, you will like this one.  Follows the investigators as they try to prove a case and make an arrest.  A live action Law and Order type show, without the courtroom stuff.

This series is just great. Forget the primetime crime dramas that focus on the vanity of the characters and take a look at the real people out on the street every night solving the real crimes. This series takes you inside the real deal and weill open your eyes to how crime solving really works.
